MainView.title: Judge4c
MainView.description: All in one place to support coding learning and teaching:

features.feature1: Integrated Language Services with Code Completion & Diagnostics
features.feature2: Multi-language Support + Real-time Execution Feedback for Faster Learning
features.feature3: World's First Open-Source Next.js + Monaco LSP Implementation

MobileFriendlyCard.title: Mobile Friendly
MobileFriendlyCard.description: Responsive design with TailwindCSS, automatically adapts to different devices (quiz interface adaptation still in development)

DockerCard.title: Ready to Use
DockerCard.description: Pre-built Docker images for quick deployment, saving configuration time

LSPCard.title: Say Goodbye to Primitive Editors
LSPCard.description: Integrated with real-time detection, code completion, and type hints

FAQs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQs.description: Can't find your answer? Contact us!

questions.answer2: Full support for C/C++ (with LSP integration), syntax highlighting for other languages
questions.question3: How do theme and language settings work?
questions.answer3: Themes auto-switch (system-aware) or can be manually set; language defaults to browser preference with manual override
questions.question4: What styling solutions are used for the editor and docs?
questions.answer4: Editor uses @shikijs/monaco themes, documentation rendered with github-markdown-css

Video.unsupportedBrowser: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.
